Package io.micronaut.security.handlers

Interface RedirectingLoginHandler<I,O>

Type Parameters:
I - Request
O - Response
All Superinterfaces:
LoginHandler<I,O>
All Known Implementing Classes:
CookieLoginHandler, IdTokenLoginHandler, SessionLoginHandler, TokenCookieLoginHandler
public interface RedirectingLoginHandler<I,O> extends LoginHandler<I,O>
A marker contract to indicate the login handler returns redirecting responses.
Since:
1.2.0
